snippet: Americans for Prosperity, founded by the billionaires David and Charles Koch, spent tens of millions of dollars in ads in a bid to defeat President Obama and Democrats in Congress, documents show.
abstract: Americans for Prosperity, political nonprofit group founded by billionaire industrialists David and Charles Koch, spent $122 million during 2012, putting it among the biggest election spenders in the country.
lead_paragraph: Americans for Prosperity, founded by the billionaires David and Charles Koch, spent tens of millions of dollars in ads in a bid to defeat President Obama and Democrats in Congress, documents show.

headline.main: $122 Million in 2012 Spending by Koch Group
headline.print_headline: $122 Million In Spending By Koch Group
